Title: MVVM for Windows 8
Description: This library contains all you need to build a WinRT Metro Style application for Windows 8 using MVVM pattern, C# and XAML.
HomeWiki:
This project contains classes that allows to follow MVVM pattern in C# Windows Store applications.

Start your project using our popular project template.

This is not a framework. So you can use features that you like.

Features:
  • Screen orientations behavior
  • Events and commands binding
  • Call a view from its model
  • Handle page navigation
  • Event triggers for animations
  • Binding converters
  • Some controls' behaviors
  • Context menu behavior
  • Context popup behavior
  • AppBar behavior
  • Settings charm panels

NuGet package: w8mvvm

See the Documentation for a sample code.

This project is supported by EastBanc Technologies international company.
